title: 'Beast from the East' blankets Europe in snow
text:
'Beast from the East' blankets Europe in snow 10:37am EST - 00:45 
Bitterly cold weather hits many parts of Europe with snow and icy winds, causing travel chaos as flights are grounded and drivers get trapped on the highway. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
